TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SpanAlign extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Text.Style.SpanAlign Baseline = int32(1)

summary.para: A constant indicating that the bottom of this span should be aligned with the baseline of the surrounding text.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Text.Style.SpanAlign Bottom = int32(0)

summary.para: A constant indicating that the bottom of this span should be aligned with the bottom of the surrounding text, i.e., at the same level as the lowest descender in the text.
